issue.title: Fix cast function issues in gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10518](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10518). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add  _NativeFunction::CanReturnErrors_ to all the cast functions so that when the validity is false we don't evaluate the function.
